game.title: Eternal Realms: Lost City
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the land of Eridoria is threatened by an ancient evil that has returned to reclaim its dominance. The Lost City of Eldarath, hidden deep within the mystical forest of Aethereia, holds the key to unlocking the secrets of the past and saving the future.
game.beginning: Players take on the role of a skilled archaeologist tasked with exploring the ruins of the Lost City, uncovering ancient artifacts, and piecing together the mysteries of Eldarath's downfall. As they delve deeper into the city, they discover that they are not alone in their quest.
game.ending: With the fate of Eridoria hanging in the balance, players must confront the dark forces head-on, using all their wits and skills to overcome treacherous landscapes, formidable enemies, and ancient puzzles. Will they be able to unlock the secrets of Eldarath and save the realm from destruction, or will the shadows consume everything?
